title: PS Raju Law College, Kakinada - Admissions, Contact, Website, Facilities 2025-2026
meta_description: PS Raju Law College, Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh Application Form, Admissions, Contact, Website, Map, L.L.B, BALLB {Hons.}, L.L.M . 4 Courses. Average Fees is 13500 per year.

basic_info.name: PS Raju Law College, Kakinada, Andhra Pradesh established with an aim to offer students with quality education the sprawling campus is allowing every interested individual to learn more along with regular academics of law. The college offers the L.L.B. course along with other graduation courses and organizes various programs that boost self confidence. With a mission to help students in completing the courses and get settled in a better position the college organizes a number of career oriented programs. The college with an intention to serve society providing legal professionals is offering updated courses in a very pleasant environment.
Facts and figures of PS Raju Law College:
Why to join PS Raju Law College, Kakinada:

State-of-Art Facilities: The college provides various facilities that allow a student to enjoy completing the academics. Starting from the library filled with many books, lab, internet and many more the college offer various impressive facilities. Also for students to get a practical experience they even have a moot court room which helps a lot in improving the self confidence of the students.

Experienced Faculty: A well experienced and highly qualified faculty teaches the academics and other basic things in this institute. The college strives to offer many interactive programs through which they can sharpen the student’s innovative thinking, skills along with inner abilities.
